img_above_text:
![Wukong Bitter 34.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/29/Wukong_Bitter_34.jpg)
When on the ground, the Apramana Bat can slam its wings down, and create a huge gust of cold air that will billow out for an extended period. Evade this by dodging and sprinting to the side so you can perform a flank attack.
img_below_text:
It can also charge up its wings by twisting its body, and will launch into two or three spin attacks by waving its wings around in a vortex as it flies at you several times.
![Wukong Bitter 37.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e9/Wukong_Bitter_37.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Bitter 34.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/29/Wukong_Bitter_34.jpg)
When on the ground, the Apramana Bat can slam its wings down, and create a huge gust of cold air that will billow out for an extended period. Evade this by dodging and sprinting to the side so you can perform a flank attack."
        - Following Text: "It can also charge up its wings by twisting its body, and will launch into two or three spin attacks by waving its wings around in a vortex as it flies at you several times.
![Wukong Bitter 37.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e9/Wukong_Bitter_37.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a battle scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the protagonist engaging in combat with the Apramana Bat, a large winged enemy. The snowy environment and skeletal structures in the background set the stage for the encounter. The health bar labeled "Apramana Bat" indicates the ongoing fight, while the player's interface displays abilities and resources. The preceding and following text describe the bat's attack patterns, including wing slams creating cold gusts and spinning vortex attacks, emphasizing strategies for evasion and counterattacks.
